description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事、政治人物，中国人民解放军少将。
description.en: A military and political figure of the People's Republic of China, and a Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级，为将官中的最低一级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, the lowest among general officers.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军负责保卫首都北京的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit of the People's Liberation Army responsible for the defense of the capital, Beijing.

en: Chief of Staff of the Beijing Garrison

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京衞戍区的参谋长职位。
description.en: The position of Chief of Staff within the PLA Beijing Garrison.

en: Deputy Commander of the Beijing Garrison

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京衞戍区的副司令员职位。
description.en: The position of Deputy Commander within the PLA Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 张宏是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zhang Hong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 张宏是中国人民解放军的军官。
description.en: Zhang Hong is an officer in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 张宏曾长期任职于北京衞戍区。
description.en: Zhang Hong has served in the Beijing Garrison for a long period.
Promoted to the rank of Major General in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任北京衞戍区参谋长，后转任副司令员。
description.en: Served as the Chief of Staff of the Beijing Garrison before being transferred to the position of Deputy Commander.

description.zh-cn: 由北京卫戍区参谋长转任副司令员。
description.en: Transferred from the position of Chief of Staff of the Beijing Garrison to become its Deputy Commander.

description.zh-cn: 北京衞戍区是中国人民解放军的下属单位。
description.en: The Beijing Garrison is a subordinate unit of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 北京衞戍区参谋长是北京衞戍区内的职位。
description.en: The Chief of Staff of the Beijing Garrison is a position within the Beijing Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 北京衞戍区副司令员是北京衞戍区内的职位。
description.en: The Deputy Commander of the Beijing Garrison is a position within the Beijing Garrison.
